text: Shannon Stephen is a Singaporean football player. He is a defender for the Tampines Rovers. ==National career== After tearing his anterior cruciate ligament twice in 2013 and 2015, Stephen rebounded and returned to the field, catching the attention of Singapore coach V Sundramoorthy.
